TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit RuleWriteAttribute extends System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleReadWriteAttribute
Public NotInheritable Class RuleWriteAttribute Inherits RuleReadWriteAttribute

summary.span: 表示屬性 (Property) 或欄位是由套用此屬性 (Attribute) 的方法或屬性 (Property) 所寫入。

span.span: Indicates that a property or field is written by the method or property that this attribute is applied to.

summary.span: 規則引擎會使用這個資訊，來判斷規則之間的相依性。

span.span: This information is used by the rules engine to determine dependencies between rules.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性 (Attribute) 可用來支援向前鏈結模型，此模型會導致根據欄位和屬性 (Property) 的變更重新評估規則。This attribute is used to support a forward chaining model that causes the re-evaluation of rules based on changes to fields and properties. 和 表示由屬性 (Property) 或套用屬性 (Attribute) 的方法所讀取或寫入的屬性 (Property)。The and indicate the properties read or written by the property or method the attribute is applied to. `RuleInvokeAttributes` 可用來表示此屬性或方法，會使用其他方法，也必須檢查的相依性。`RuleInvokeAttributes` are used to indicate that this property or method uses other methods, which must also be checked for dependencies.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string path) cil managed

param.name: path
param.span: 欄位或屬性 (Property)，與套用此屬性 (Attribute) 的方法或屬性 (Property) 位於同一個類別中。

span.span: The field or property that is on the same class as the method or property that this attribute is applied to.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要指定方法或屬性寫入至其中一個參數的欄位或屬性，您必須使用 (path, `RuleAttributeTarget.Parameter`)。To specify that the method or property writes to a field or property on one of the parameters, you must use (path, `RuleAttributeTarget.Parameter`).

span.span: The field or property that is on the same class as the method or property that this attribute is applied to.

param.name: target
param.span: 列舉值，決定如何使用路徑尋找目標。

span.span: enumeration value that determines how to use path to find target.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要指定方法或屬性寫入至其中一個參數的欄位或屬性，您必須使用 (path, `RuleAttributeTarget.Parameter`)。To specify that the method or property writes to a field or property on one of the parameters, you must use (path, `RuleAttributeTarget.Parameter`).
